content.rendered:
When a corrupt federal agent becomes embroiled in a human trafficking ring, sniper and CIA recruit Brandon Beckett uncovers the corrupt agent and takes down the criminal organization, teaming up with former allies Homeland Security Agent Zero and assassin Lady Death.

Directed By Oliver Thompson

Written By Oliver Thompson

Stars: Chad Michael Collins. Ryan Robbins. Sayaka Akimoto
